mapper.sql: select a.enterprise_id as enterpriseId, a.account_code as code, a.account_name as name, a.account_type as type, a.status as status, a.account_roles as roles, a.description as description, e.name as merchant, a.CREATED_TIME, a.CREATED_BY, a.UPDATED_TIME, a.UPDATED_BY from tpl_account_t a left join tpl_enterprise_t e on a.enterprise_id = e.id
mapper.select: select count(*) from tpl_account_t a left join tpl_enterprise_t e on a.enterprise_id = e.id
